DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine safest dose ZD4054 ( Zibotentan ) men prostate cancer
DOC.brief_title: A Phase IIa . Open-label , Multicenter , Dose-escalation Study Assess Tolerability Pharmacokinetics ZD4054 ( Zibotentan ) Given Orally Once Daily Subjects With Metastatic Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Men 18 year & old Confirmed diagnosis prostate cancer bone metastases No 2 prior chemotherapy regimens No radiation , chemotherapy bisphosphonates past 4 week
